ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
RecordTypeId = "01270000000UQ53" && NOT(ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"(1 of 12) Sales Rep Conducting Needs Analysis")|| (ISPICKVAL( Current_Step__c ,"")))&&
ISBLANK(Text( Paychex_TAA__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Paychex TAA is a required field when "Current Step" field is not equal to "(1 of 12) Sales Rep Conducting Needs Analysis"
